blocks.name: creverse
blocks.content: Syntax for the word reverse operator.

blocks.name: df-reverse
blocks.content: Define an operation which reverses the order of symbols in a word. This operation is also known as "word reversal" and "word mirroring". (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: revval
blocks.content: Value of the word reversing function. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm revval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(creverse, c0), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(creverse, c0), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, creverse, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(s0)))), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(hs0))), cfv(cv(hs0), co(co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(s0)))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(hs0))), cfv(cv(hs0), co(co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(s0))), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2d(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cfv(chash, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq12d(cv(hs0), co(co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(s0)), c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1d(co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1d(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1, cfv(chash, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, chash)
  df-reverse(hs0, s0)
  mptex(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(s0))))
  ovex(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cfzo.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s0)
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(reverse ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà(0[..^](# ` c0))‚Ü¶(c0 `(((# ` c0)[-]1)[-]s0))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, (reverse ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà(0[..^](# ` c0))‚Ü¶(c0 `(((# ` c0)[-]1)[-]s0))), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, creverse, (s0 ‚àà(0[..^](# ` c0))‚Ü¶(c0 `(((# ` c0)[-]1)[-]s0))), (s0 ‚àà(0[..^](# ` hs0))‚Ü¶(hs0 `(((# ` hs0)[-]1)[-]s0))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, (0[..^](# ` hs0)), (hs0 `(((# ` hs0)[-]1)[-]s0)), (0[..^](# ` c0)), (c0 `(((# ` c0)[-]1)[-]s0)), hs0 = c0)
  oveq2d(nat0, cfzo, (# ` hs0), (# ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq12d(hs0, (((# ` hs0)[-]1)[-]s0), c0, (((# ` c0)[-]1)[-]s0), hs0 = c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  oveq1d(((# ` hs0)[-]1), cmin, s0, ((# ` c0)[-]1), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1d((# ` hs0), cmin, nat1, (# ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, chash)
  df-reverse(hs0, s0)
  mptex(s0, (0[..^](# ` c0)), (c0 `(((# ` c0)[-]1)[-]s0)))
  ovex(nat0, cfzo, (# ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àà(0[..^](# ` c0))‚Ü¶(c0 `(((# ` c0)[-]1)[-]s0))))

blocks.name: revcl
blocks.content: The reverse of a word is a word. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  revval(hs0, c0, cword(c1))

  fmpttd(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0))), c1, wcel(c0, cword(c1)))

  adantr(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))), wf(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), c1))
  wrdf(c0, c1)
  eleqtrrd(co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(nat0, cfz, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))))

  eleqtrd(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))
  fznn0sub2(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(nat0, cfz, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1))), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cz))
  nn0zd(cfv(chash, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))
  lencl(c0, c1)
  fzoval(cfv(chash, c0), nat0)
  iswrdi(cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)))), cfv(chash, c0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))

  fmpttd(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0))), c1, wcel(c0, cword(c1)))

  eleqtrd(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))

  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))), wceq(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(nat0, cfz, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1))), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cz))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))

blocks.name: revfv
blocks.content: Reverse of a word at a point. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Aug-2015.)

thm revfv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

} = {
  sylan9eq(cfv(cfv(creverse, c0), c2), cfv(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, c2)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)))), c2), wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))
  fveq1d(cfv(creverse, c0), c2, cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cword(c1)))
  revval(hs0, c0, cword(c1))
  fvmpt(hs0, c2, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)))), cfv(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, c2)), cfv(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0))))
  fveq2d(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)), co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c2, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)))))
  fvex(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmin, c2)))

blocks.name: rev0
blocks.content: The empty word is its own reverse. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Aug-2015.)

thm revccat(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
